about_the_game:
Whispers of Gold is a choice-driven visual novel set in a medieval free city. You are Arthur, a mercenary trying to make ends meet who investigates the abduction of a scion. On your journey, you will have to make a lot of difficult decisions. To kill or to spare? To get to the bottom of the mystery or to give in to greed?

Key features:

  • 4 hours of gameplay;
  • 8 main endings, one secret ending, and many ways to die at someone’s hand;
  • Mini-games;
  • A medieval setting with its own unique inner-workings;
  • Authentic visual presentation;
  • Original soundtrack.

Game mechanics:

  • Looking for clues will be your top aide in solving mysteries and learning the truth. What can a room reveal about its owner?


  • Pick locks to get to the hard-to-reach answers. What secrets are being hidden away from prying eyes?
